search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Marketo (marketo.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: It appears the official pricing page for Marketo Engage isn't readily available online. Their pricing seems tailored and varies by customer needs, so you're advised to contact their sales or Customer Success Manager for accurate information【3:3†source】.

Re: What is the cost of a dedicated IP address?


---------------------------------------------------

Well, prices could be subjective and can vary from customer to customer based on the existing subscription and services purchased and hence you won’t find accurate pricing online. Strongly recommend you to reach out to your CSM (Customer Success Manager) to get the exact details about pricing.

Re: What is the cost of a dedicated IP address?


---------------------------------------------------

Hi[@James\_Moffat](https://nation.marketo.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/40882) ,

Please consider the following notes before purchasing the dedicated IP address.

A dedicated IP is an add-on product. Not everyone will be eligible to add a dedicated IP to their program. You would need to send more than 100,000 emails per month and have a stable campaign cadence to maintain a dedicated IP.

If you send less than 100,000 emails per month, and/or have variable campaign volumes, and/or are a seasonal sender, you will be unable to maintain a dedicated IP. Marketo does maintain a separate Trusted IP shared pool for customers that abide by strict best practices. If interested, please fill out [this questionnaire](https://na-sjg.marketo.com/lp/marketoprivacydemo/Trusted-IP-Sending-Range-Program.html) to apply to Marketo’s Trusted IP Program.

Thanks and regards,

Avinash Jadhav

Re: What is the cost of a dedicated IP address?


---------------------------------------------------

Thanks, Avinash but I don't think this questionnaire form submissions are still actively monitored - and moreover this is for applying for the trusted IPs which are different from the dedicated IPs as inquired by James. ![Image 14: :slightly_smiling_face:](https://nation.marketo.com/html/@EB694DDD54F375CF57025B10440E5C66/emoticons/1f642.png)

[@James\_Moffat](https://nation.marketo.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/40882), if you're interested in the dedicated IP (or even trusted IPs) the best and the fastest way IMO would be to reach out to your CSM / your Marketo contact person first (many processes got changed post Adobe's acquisition).
